relation: I walk alone at night all the time. I feel safe.
Make friends. go out to eat, go to philly, play board games, go to the mall.
Not the best. Not the worst. You'll want to go to wawa alot.

I like dorm life. However people can be loud. One tip: The RAs will act like your friend, then turn you in for the littlest thing. They can be pretty corrupt. Keep them at a distance. Student leadership is kinda corrupt.
Do your work and you'll be fine. College is work.
Don't schedule morning classes! they're a killer. This is a great school. Live in a single if possible.
pageTitle: University of Valley Forge (UVF) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {63519=I have always wanted to attend this college ever since I graduated high school. I am looking forward to going fall 2013. This is a new chapter for me and I'm awaiting to see the end result., 24886=The Academics here are good, and like any other college i'm sure if you procrastinate it's going to be too much for you to handle. Since there are about 1000 students on the entire campus the Professors have more time for the students and are always there to try and help them., 102328=My advice to prospective students would be to call the Forge and speak to a Financial Aid coordinator as they are very helpful in navigating the Financial Aid process and will make sure you have applied/signed up for all the Financial Aid you are eligible for. Also, don't wait until the last minute to get all of the paperwork in. The quicker you turn all of that in, the easier check-in will be on your arrival/move in day. Finally, I would advise students to get connected! Join the Class of 2019 (or whatever your year would be) page on Facebook and say Hello! These connections and friendships you will make are going to be life-long relationships with people who will love, encourage, and advocate for you!, 106056=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}
textBeforeTable: 06/09/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 9 out of 9 people found this review useful. 1 of 24 Haley from Shoemakersville, PA Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. You could win a free scholarship. textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Ashley from Phoenixville, PA 01/17/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 3 of 24 Categories Comments Campus Safety Security circle the campus all the time and are easily contactable. Greek Life There is no greek life. Clubs and Activities There are clubs for just about any productive thing to do. Great for these types of students Students who love God and want to have a safe environment that is safe at the same time. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus Not to many unusual things on campus. What to do for fun Go to the music room and have a jam session or join one of them they are always going on.
